Text:
One more thing: for complete beginners I recommend Pimsleur Spanish first, before Spanish Like Crazy. Pimsleur progress slower and has less new vocabulary and is generally better for beginner, but Spanish Like Crazy is good to build vocabulary and get further practice

http://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/7610608/Pimsleur_Spanish_I__II__III___amp_amp__Plus_%28Complete_Course%29_-_Down
